title: Capabilities Overview
headers: Project-Relevant Commands in Application Information Page
content:
# Capabilities Overview > ### Note: > To view information on the features available in your application, open the Command Palette \([CMD/CTRL\] + [Shift\] + [P\] \) and execute the *Fiori: Open Application Info* command. For more information, see [Application Information](../Project-Functions/application-information-c3e0989.md). The following table lists the SAP Fiori tools features provided in each template and data source. ## Project-Relevant Commands in Application Information Page
Feature Command Description SAP Fiori Elements Freestyle SAPUI5 UI5 Library V2 V4 EDMX Back End CAP Node.js CAP Java Component Adaptation Projects Extension Projects
Add Deploy Config `sap.ux.appGenerator.launchDeployConfig` Add deploy configuration. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Add Fiori Launchpad Config `sap.ux.appGenerator.launchFlpConfig` Add the SAP Fiori launchpad configuration to the application. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)    
Add Local Annotation File `sap.ux.adp.addAnnotationFile` Add a local annotation file to the adaptation project.                   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)  
Add Mockserver Config `npx --yes @sap-ux/create@latest add mockserver-config` Add configuration for mockserver middleware. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
Add SAPUI5 Components `sap.ux.adp.addSAPUI5ComponentUsages` Add SAPUI5 component usages to the adaptation project.                   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)  
Add Variants Config `sap.ux.applicationModeler.addVariantsConfig` Add Configuration for Variants Creation. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
Build Application `npm run build` Build the application. The results are stored in the `dist` folder. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)         ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Change Inbound `sap.ux.adp.changeInbound` Add an inbound change to the adaptation project.                   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)  
Change minUI5Version `sap.ux.applicationModeler.changeMinUI5Version` Change the minimum version of SAPUI5 that this application requires. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Check Node Modules `npm outdated` Execute command that checks all node module dependencies for newer versions. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Check Service `sap.ux.serviceModeler.openFile` Check service with annotation. You can copy annotations to local annotation file. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
Convert Preview Config `sap.ux.applicationModeler.convertPreview` Convert the configuration to preview the application with virtual endpoints. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
Create Archive `sap.ux.environmentcheck.archiveProject` Zip the project excluding the `node_modules` folder for sharing which can be useful in support cases. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Deploy `sap.ux.appGenerator.launchDeploy` Deploy according to the configuration by default stored in the `ui5-deploy.yaml`. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Maintain Mockdata `sap.ux.dataEditor.open` Start editor for maintaining mock data. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
Manage Service Models `sap.ux.serviceModeler.openServiceMgr` You can sync `metadata.xml` with the back end. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)    
Manage XML Annotations `sap.ux.serviceModeler.openAnnotationFileMgr` You can choose or create local `XML` annotation files. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)    
Open Adaptation Editor `sap.ux.adp.openAdaptationEditor` Open the Adaptation Editor to create adaptations.                   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)  
Open Data Editor `sap.ux.dataEditor.open` Open the Data Editor to maintain mock data. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
Open Deployment Wizard `sap.ux.adp.openDeploymentWizard` Open the Deployment Wizard to deploy the adaptation project.                   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)  
Open Documentation `sap.ux.applicationModeler.showDocu` Open the documentation of available manifest and SAPUI5 flexibility properties. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)      
Open Guided Development `sap.ux.help.openGuidedDevelopmentFromExplorer` Guided Development helps solve common tasks. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)      
Open Page Map `sap.ux.pageMap.showMap` Open the page map that shows application pages and navigation paths. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)      
Preview Application `sap.ux.pageEditor.previewExternal` Choose from start scripts to run the application preview. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Replace OData Service `sap.ux.adp.replaceODataService` Replace the OData service of the adaptation project.                   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)  
Run UI5 Linter `sap.ux.applicationModeler.runUI5Linter` Run a static code analysis to validate compliance with SAPUI5 best practices. For more information, see [UI5 linter](https://github.com/SAP/ui5-linter). ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Run Variants Management `npm run start-variants-management` Run the configuration for variants creation. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
Show Documentation `sap.ux.applicationModeler.showDocu` Show documentation of available manifest and UI5 flexibility properties. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)      
Test Deployment `npm run deploy-test` Start deployment in test mode. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)    
Undeploy `npm run undeploy` Remove a deployed artifact from back end or cloud. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)   ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)
Validate Project `sap.ux.applicationModeler.validate` Validate the project and generate a report. ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)     ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png) ![](images/Checkmark_Good_8eb8536.png)          
                           
## Scripting Languages SAP Fiori apps are based on the SAPUI5 framework. SAP Fiori tools supports the development of SAP Fiori apps with JavaScript or TypeScript. For more information, see [UI5 and TypeScript](https://sap.github.io/ui5-typescript). ## Usability The following support keyboard navigation and high contrast theming: - *Guided Development* extension - *Page Map* - *Page Editor* - *Application Info* Keyboard navigation provides a streamlined experience enabling users to use the application without a mouse. Use the arrow keys to navigate within sections, the [Tab\] key to navigate to new sections and controls, [Shift\] + [Tab\] to navigate back to sections and controls, and [Enter\] to make selections. A high contrast theme provides better readability and accessibility. You can switch to a high contrast theme using *Preferences* \> *Color Themes* in VS Code or SAP Business Application Studio.
